resources.string: This is an overview of top tournament and ranked matches currently being played (Live tab) and recently finished (Recent tab).
Swipe left and right to switch between live and recent matches
Swipe down to refresh the according list
Click once on a match to show or hide a detailed match view
Press and hold on a ranked match to switch between pro players\' official names (highlighted in yellow) and current Steam names
Tournament matches show the pro teams\' names instead of \"Radiant\" and \"Dire\"
Live ranked matches are sorted by average MMR
Recent matches are sorted by time finished (most recent at the top of the list)

To spectate a live match, find it in the \"Watch\" tab in your Dota 2 client. Alternatively, type the command given in the detailed match view of a live match into your Dota 2 console and press Enter.
The screen to show when the app starts
If enabled, entries in Top Matches are expanded by default
The leaderboard to show when entering Leaderboards

This app is being developed and maintained by a small group of amateur and professional developers. We came together through a post on /r/dota2. You can follow the development and see the whole source code here.
We started this app in the hopes of learning more about Android development. It has been quite a journey already and we are always looking to learn more by implementing new things.

The current state of the app is not the final result of this project. We are always looking for feedback, especially related to the UI. If you have any suggestions or bug reports, please let us know here by creating a new issue.
App needs permission to access the current network state!
App needs permission to connect to the internet!
Network error. Please check your internet connection
